# splattr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/splattr)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=splattr)
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of splattr is to provide some HTML-based tools for viewing and evaluating color-palettes.

## Installation


You can install the delevopment version of codefolder from [GitHub](https://github.com/ijlyttle/splattr) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ijlyttle/splattr")
```
